# PUBLIC COPY RESTRICTIONS

These rules apply to all customer-facing text, UI, and messaging.

---

## NEVER DISCLOSE

- Internal hourly costs
- Internal daily costs
- Margins or profit percentages
- Burn rates
- Equipment financing details
- Safety thresholds as negotiable
- Internal decision logic

---

## NEVER PROMISE

- Permit acquisition
- Guaranteed timelines
- Guaranteed pricing
- Discounts
- Safety exceptions

---

## NEVER EXPLAIN

- Pricing formulas
- Cost breakdown math
- Seasonal multipliers numerically
- Internal lead filtering
- Advertising logic

---

## ALWAYS

- Use plain English
- Maintain a firm, professional tone
- Emphasize safety and feasibility
- Reinforce scope and minimum requirements
- Defer permits to property owners

If content conflicts with these rules, remove it.
